kpi_info.title: MB max load ratio - TRB
kpi_info.use: This is the maximum load of the message bus during the measurement period. KPI used for Token Ring message bus.
kpi_info.use_experience:
Must be used the RAW views since NetAct defined aggregated rules are AVG for TIME + NETWORK.

LAST UPDATE: 07-01-2010
RECOMMENDED SUMMARY LEVELS: (PLMN - MSC - UNIT) + (PLMN - HLR - UNIT) + (PLMN - SRR - UNIT)
KPI CLASS: Resource
MEASUREMENT(S): Message bus load observation report (120/78H)
